column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: Contents of property
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
Used to set the operation mode (ventilation mode, bathroom pre-warmer mode, bathroom heater mode, bathroom dryer mode, cool air circulator mode or “stop”), and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Ventilation operation              : 0x10 Bathroom pre-warmer operation : 0x20 Bathroom heater operation   : 0x30 Bathroom dryer operation      : 0x40 Cool air circulator operation : 0x50 Stop                                           :0x00

column3: Used to set the ventilation air flow rate level for the ventilation mode and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Automatic        : 0x41 Standard          : 0x42 Air flow rate level    : 0x31.0x38

column3: Used to set the bathroom pre-warming level for the bathroom pre-warmer mode and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the bathroom heating level for the bathroom heater mode and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the bathroom drying level for the bathroom dryer mode and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the cool air circulation level for the cool air circulator mode and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Automatic        : 0x41 Standard          : 0x42 Cool air circulation level : 0x31.0x38

column3: Used to acquire the measured relative humidity of the bathroom.
Used to acquire the measured temperature of the bathroom.
Used to set the air flow rate level for the around-the-clock ventilation function and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the filter cleaning reminder sign status (lit/not lit) and to acquire the current setting.
Used to acquire the human body detection status.
Used to set the ON/OFF status of the ON timer-based reservation function and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Reservation function ON: 0x41 Reservation function OFF: 0x42

column3: Used to set the ON/OFF status of the ON timer-based reservation function with the mode in which the device starts operating specified, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Reservation function ON for the ventilation mode                     : 0x10 Reservation function ON for the bathroom pre-warmer mode : 0x20 Reservation function ON for the bathroom heater mode         : 0x30 Reservation function ON for the bathroom dryer mode            : 0x40 Reservation function ON for the cool air circulator mode       : 0x50 Reservation function OFF : 0x00

column3: Used to set the time setting for the time-based reservation function for the ON timer (in the HH:MM format) and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the relative time setting for the relative time-based reservation function for the ON timer (in the HH:MM format) and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the ON/OFF status of the OFF timer-based reservation function and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Reservation function ON: 0x41 Reservation function OFF: 0x42

column3: Used to set the time setting for the time-based reservation function for the OFF timer (in the HH:MM format) and to acquire the current setting.
Used to set the relative time setting for the relative time-based reservation function for the OFF timer (in the HH:MM format) and to acquire the current setting.
